channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At Black Colleges, a Stubborn Gender Enrollment Gap Keeps Growing
item.description: Only 19 percent of students at Howard University are Black men, whose enrollment levels at four-year colleges have plummeted across the board.

item.title: Prince Harry Accused of ‘Bullying’ by Chair of Charity He Co-founded
item.description: Sophie Chandauka said Harry quit as patron of the organization to damage it after failing to oust her from the role following a series of board confli...

item.title: A Competitive Race for Mike Waltz’s Seat Rattles Republicans
item.description: Democrats are hoping to do better in Florida’s Sixth District than they did in November, when President Trump won it by 30 points.

item.title: Gen Z are terrified of layoffs and the spiraling economy—so they’re copying Steve Jobs and showing up to the office in uniforms
item.description: After getting fired for dressing inappropriately, young workers are now ditching the crop tops and “office siren” looks in exchange for a Steve Jobs-s...

item.title: Syrians Wake Up to a New Government
item.description: The list of ministers appears to be a compromise between calls for a diverse cabinet to unite the divided country while keeping allies of the interim ...

item.title: Can Barcelona Solve One of the Toughest Housing Crises in Europe?
item.description: The Spanish city’s woes mirror a broader affordable-housing crunch spreading rapidly across Europe and driving inequality.

item.title: After the devastating LA wildfires, KB Home unveils a ‘fire-resilient’ community just outside San Diego—and a third of the homes have already sold
item.description: The homes have fire-rated roofs, noncombustible gutters, and buffer zones.

item.title: Overnight multimillionaire and Beast Games winner says MrBeast taught him when it’s okay to lose millions on your passion project
item.description: Despite Beast Games loosing “tens of millions” of dollars, the game’s $10 million winner says MrBeast’s dedication is inspiring.

item.title: Trump says auto tariffs are permanent and doesn’t care if they cause carmakers to hike prices — ‘I hope they raise their prices’
item.description: "I couldn’t care less. I hope they raise their prices, because if they do, people are gonna buy American-made cars. We have plenty," Trump said.

item.title: Prince Harry Accused of ‘Bullying’ by Chair of Charity He Co-founded
item.description: Sophie Chandauka said Harry quit as patron of the organization to damage it after failing to oust her from the role following a series of board confli...

item.title: What We Know About Talks for a Renewed Gaza Cease-Fire
item.description: Hamas said it had accepted a proposal for a new cease-fire, which would see some hostages released from captivity in Gaza. But details were elusive.

item.title: Syrians Wake Up to a New Government
item.description: The list of ministers appears to be a compromise between calls for a diverse cabinet to unite the divided country while keeping allies of the interim ...

item.title: ‘They Will Label Us as Spies’: The Afghan Students Abandoned by America
item.description: Students at the American University of Afghanistan in Qatar fear having to return to their Taliban-ruled homeland after aid and visa cutoffs by the Tr...

item.title: Map: 7.1-Magnitude Earthquake Near Tonga Promps Tsunami Alert
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Myanmar quake death toll rises to 1,644 as resistance movement announces partial ceasefire
item.description: The number of injured increased to 3,408, while the missing figure rose to 139.
